channel.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
channel.description:
http://www.thersmg.com/2010/05/shads-billionaires-guide.html
It looks very convincing, and this site [i]does[/i] have some good money making guides, is it real? or fake? because i just may consider purchasing it :D

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o

item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Sounds like a scam to me.

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:18, topic:373979”]Just because a site is the first result on a google search, does NOT mean it is reputable or not a scam. In fact, you may want to suspect them more, as scam sites will generally cheat the google page rank more than a legit site.[/quote]Like I said, I used to work for this site; all of the guides are real, it’s just not worth the money. And the search results are fully legitimate.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

item.source: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

To be honest, don’t buy into these things. Even if it isn’t a scam, it’s probably not worth it. When I used to love RuneScape when I was around 11 years old, I had my dad buy me a long guide of tons of methods to making money. Most of the methods inside it I already knew. Besides, you can find really good money making methods online for free. In fact, check the money making methods topic in the RuneScape Discussion board. I, along with others, have posted some decent methods.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Just because a site is the first result on a google search, does NOT mean it is reputable or not a scam. In fact, you may want to suspect them more, as scam sites will generally cheat the google page rank more than a legit site.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

What you do is, go out in the wild with all your stuff in your bank cash and all(on a bounty world) Get killed, cry on the forums saying you didn’t know it was a bounty world and that you will sue if you don’t get your stuff back, then JaGeX gives it all back and some. Then repeat.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Want a millionaire money making guide? Write you own, boom, sell hundreds of copies for the low low price of $70 USD, your set for a few years! How else do you think these people got rich? It was just common knowledge things put into a book anybody can do, simple as that. They make the book, sell a few thousand copies, and boom, rich.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

item.title: Is this worthit? is it a scam? :o
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Use the free guides, they tell you all the best methods to lure you into buying the paid guide with a promise of even better methods. I have been using this site for awhile, but I have never bought any of their guides.

Read full topic
